short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to check if the same book is available on pre loved book stores

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Purani Kitabay is a Chrome extension build for book lovers in India. This little extension enhances your Amazon book browsing experience by automatically searching for pre-loved versions of the books you're interested in, potentially saving you money while promoting sustainable reading habits.

Key Features

Automatic Search: As you browse books on Amazon, Purani Kitabay works silently in the background, searching for secondhand copies across multiple trusted Indian bookstores.

Wide Network of Sellers: We scour reputable pre-loved book providers, including but not limited to MyPustak and 99BooksCart, ensuring you have access to a broad selection of secondhand books.

Verified Quality: The stores provide verified pre-loved books, not pirated copies. You can shop with confidence, knowing you're getting genuine books in good condition.

Price Comparison: Easily compare the prices of new books on Amazon with pre-loved options, helping you make informed purchasing decisions.

India-Focused: Tailored specifically for the Indian market, Purani Kitabay connects you with local secondhand book providers, supporting the circular economy within India.

Environmental Impact: By choosing pre-loved books, you're contributing to reducing paper waste and the environmental impact of book production.
User-Friendly Interface: Results are displayed in an easy-to-understand format, allowing you to quickly see available options without interrupting your browsing experience.

Support Local Businesses: By connecting you with various Indian secondhand book providers, Purani Kitabay helps support local businesses and book enthusiasts.

Your gateway to sustainable reading, cost savings, and the joy of discovering pre-loved books. Whether you're a student looking to save on textbooks, a voracious reader on a budget, or someone who loves the character of a gently used book, Purani Kitabay is your perfect companion for book shopping in India.
Install Purani Kitabay today and unlock a world of affordable, sustainable reading options with just one click!
